forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and windy at times. Rain becoming heavy at times late. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and becoming windy. Rain may be heavy late. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain. The rain may be heavy at times early. Potential for heavy rainfall. High near 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain, possibly heavy at times early. Winds diminishing late. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
